data.name: Fisherman's House
data.detailed_description:
You have been mysteriously captured by the terrifying fisherman. The fisherman is famous for kidnapping his victims to eat them afterwards. Your mission? To escape as quickly as possible before the fisherman slaughter you.

The Fisherman's House awaits you in this game. In this house there are all sorts of tools and keys that can help you escape from the house. But you should be careful, because the fisherman listens very clearly.

Features


  • Randomly generated puzzles — Each game includes new randomly generated locations where items like keys or tools can be hidden.
  • Different levels of difficulty — There are different levels of difficulty that change the speed of movement of the fisherman.
  • He can hear you — Not only the sounds you make inside the game, but also your microphone is part of the game. However, the microphone can be turned off if you like.
  • VR-Mode — Play Fisherman's House like never before! Use your favorite VR headset for a whole new experience.

Have fun and enjoy exploring!

data.short_description: You have been kidnapped, and you don't know why and where you are. All you know is that you have to escape from this place before the fisherman kills you. In this house, you will find some items and puzzles that will help you escape from this house. Will you survive or get killed by the fisherman?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X, Intel Core i7 4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes horror elements like jumpscares, creepy sound effects and use of dark effects.
